analysis.key_quote: Schedule P/C would open the door wide to political corruption, as well as greatly lowering the performance of the federal government by destroying internal knowledge about what works, what doesn't work, and how to get things done in a complex system and world.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the erosion of merit-based civil service protections, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, all of which align with a defense of the current civil service system.
